title: Yasuo is like a Stopwatch.
body:
{{item:2421}} 
**IS BROKEN, BUT CAN STILL BE UPGRADED**

replies.body:
I thought you'd say something like:

At some point during the game he'll become broken and stay that way the rest of the game.
I'd say Yasuos are more like Klepto, they are based on RNG, they either wintrade /INT or they pop off and carry

Hate aside, but I feel his RNG is more dependent on how good are his enemies in playing against him, hence his higher winrate in low elo
[48% in bronze+](https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/yasuo/bronze)
[44% in diamond+](https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/yasuo/diamond)
well obviously, what I said is a joke
Upvoting for the funny joke, but your opinion is still wrong.
Go back to gameplay boards you unfunny  animal.
Go back to gameplay boards you unfunny idiot.
